message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm confident we can reach a price that works for both of us.  How does $20,000 sound to start?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you be able to accommodate this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is already a significant discount on the value this product brings.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet you at $17,500. I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for the product. Could you consider coming down to $15,000?
